column5: Looking to buy tickets for a leaf game in Montreal, is their any safe way to purchase tickets off a seller on kijiji in Montreal? I know of ticket liquidator/stub hub but not many post on their because of the loss due to fees. Does anyone know if paypal covers you on tickets?  Thanks guys

Official resale site  http://canadiens.nhl.com/club/page.htm?id=74638  The sites I used for my Tampa Bay tickets in March  http://www.ticketroundup.com/montreal-canadiens  http://www.superstartickets.com/Montreal-Canadiens

Ended up finding a friend of a friend selling 320B to the game. Does anyone here know how the view is, i noticed it said blocked by the pressbox. All the sections views online show the white section not the gray.
